pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, July 7, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sudbury, Ontario

Private meetings

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local mining engineering facility.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of Science North’s Student Science Advisory Council.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a tree planting event. Minister of Environment and Climate Change Steven Guilbeault will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
